actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the acquisition of certain lands for addition to Rocky Mountain National Park in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the acquisition of lands totaling approximately 1,017.5 acres, for addition to Rocky Mountain National Park in the State of Colorado. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the acquisition of certain lands for addition to Rocky Mountain National Park in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.
